DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether patient opioid induced constipation prefer treatment naloxegol ( Movantik ) Polyethylene Glycol 3350 .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Patient Preference Movantik Polyethylene Glycol 3350 Opioid Induced Constipation
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , randomize , open-label crossover study consist 1-week washout period , 2-week treatment period , another 1-week washout final 2-week treatment period . The study ass overall patient preference Movantik versus Polyethylene Glycol 3350 treatment opioid-induced constipation . This study also evaluate reason patient preference ( among subject indicate preference ) , patient global impression change , change bowel function treatment period measure Bowel Function Index . Patient 's bowel movement diary also collect study .
